EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Express Confirmation for SunPower Solar Consultation
To: {!Account.Name}
From: Gaea Arkoncel
Telephone: 408-457-2715
Message: We have scheduled a visit for our solar consultant to visit your home. Our solar consultant will provide you with a detailed proposal for a solar electric solution customized for your home.
Appointment Date and Time: {!Opportunity.Appointment_Date_Time__c}
Solar Consultant:
About the Appointment: Noel will be driving a SunPower-marked vehicle and will be wearing a SunPower shirt. The comprehensive solar electric survey may take up to two hours depending on your questions. During that time, Noel will recommend a solar electric system based on your specific requirements.
To best design a system for your home we request that you please reply to this message with information on your electric usage over the last 12 months. If you are a PG&E customer, the process is very easy to complete online:
1) Go to www.PGE.com
2) Click “Residential”
3) Create an account (if you don’t already have one)
4) Click usage
5) Click history
6) Cut and Paste into a Reply message.
You can also call PG&E at 800-743-5000 and have them read the usage to you over the phone. It should take just a few minutes of your time, but is a crucial step in understanding your energy usage and needs for a complete solar consultation.
If you are interested in financing pre-approval, please apply below:
https://addisonavenue.com/oao/step1.aspx?prod=loansolar
